The diagrams exported by the tool use the GraphML format, compatible with the yEd free editor.
The yEd tool is a free diagram editor allowing to show, export and manipulate diagrams in the GraphML format.
The export feature of the tool produce graphML files wich are compatible with the yEd tool.
Note that the exported diagrams have to layout, you will need to use the layout features of yEd to obtain a readable diagram.
